name: STONE (itch)
description:
STONE is an action-platformer game by BAD DOGS(FPDG +Quirrel).

You are a wolf who lives on treasure hunting. One day, you got a clue about the Grand Treasure. Get ready! It’s time to get away from your boring life. The clue said, “Go through the perilous paths and find me in the uninhabited mountain.” Just when you succeeded, the ground vanished, and you fell into the abyss. With the extraordinary power from the treasure in your hands, a brand-new road is created. Go ahead! Explore the underground, collect the treasures, aware the monsters, watch out for cliffs and traps while enjoying the varied scenery. Use your SHIFT skill to solve puzzles in an incredible environment and look carefully for the way out. No one knows what is waiting for you.
